abstract: Institute for Supply Management reports its services index rose to 56 in June, from 55.7 in May, due to business activity and new orders increasing.
lead_paragraph: United States service firms grew at a slightly faster pace in June, as business activity and new orders increased.

headline.main: Service Firms Expand in June but Job Growth Rate May Slow
headline.print_headline: Service Firms Expand in June but Job Growth Rate May Slow

snippet: United States service firms grew at a slightly faster pace in June, as business activity and new orders increased.
